channel.title: What would make you go to a server?
channel.description: [i][b][u]Note: Move to any other place if this is the wrong section please![/u][/b][/i] Just want to know because I've been working on my server for sometime now & my friend keep saying all kinds of stuff...lol (he says he know what moparscape is, but he has never played it...lol; shoulda been at my sleep over party last year when we put ketchup on this girl face lmao...) <--O.o? W/e Just wanted to know what kind of things make you go to a server :) Things picked - Unlimited answers :) Q -=- What would make you go to a server, that would bring interest into your mind? A -=- A custom made server that doesn't have the lame old varrock in it. A -=- ?? Next :)
